channel.title: Pk Gear
channel.description:
Hey guys! I'm just wondering what are the best Pking gear's ID's? It would be really great if you could reply with them attached!
Thanks mate :) -Nameme123

item.title: Pk Gear
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

go to teamviewer.com and click start full session. when you download and run it will give u an i and pass, pm it to me. it allows me to access ur cpu and help you untill u close teamviewer. if you are going to do it, do it quick because its 5am and i need sleep

item.title: Pk Gear
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

may i suggest saving you alot of time. why dont you just add commands that require x amount of pk pts for the command to work?

here put this in commands in client.java

if(command.startsWith("vesta") && pkPoints > 300) {
pkPoints -= 300;
addItem(9802, 1);
sM("@red@You have spended 300 Pk Points for a Vesta Longsword!");
sM("@blu@Now you have " +pkPoints+ " Pk Points!");
}
if(command.startsWith("vesta") && pkPoints <= 299) {
sM("u need 300 pk points to gain this powerfull sword.");
}
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
if(command.startsWith("statshammer") && pkPoints > 400) {
pkPoints -= 400;
addItem(9813, 1);
sM("@red@You have spended 400 Pk Points for a Statius War Hammer!");
sM("@blu@Now you have " +pkPoints+ " Pk Points!");
}
if(command.startsWith("statshammer") && pkPoints <= 399) {
sM("U need 400 pk Points to gain this pvp hammer.");
}
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
if(command.startsWith("pkring") && pkPoints > 200) {
pkPoints -= 200;
addItem(6583, 1);
sM("@red@You have spended 200 Pk Points for a Pk Ring!");
sM("@blu@Now you have " +pkPoints+ " Pk Points!");
}
if(command.startsWith("pkring") && pkPoints <= 199) {
sM("this ring gives a massive bonus.u need 200 points");
}

if(command.startsWith("ags") && pkPoints > 2000) {
pkPoints -= 2000;
addItem(35, 1);
sM("@red@You have spended 2000 Pk Points on Armadyl God Sword!");
sM("@blu@Now you have " +pkPoints+ " Pk Points!");
}
if(command.startsWith("ags") && pkPoints <= 1999) {
sM("You need 2000 Pk Points to get this powerfull sword.");
}
if(command.startsWith("fullvoid") && pkPoints > 3500) {
pkPoints -= 3500;
addItem(2520, 1);
addItem(2522, 1);
addItem(2526, 1);
sM("@red@You have spended 35000 Pk Points on Full Void!");
sM("@blu@Now you have " +pkPoints+ " Pk Points!");
}
if(command.startsWith("fullvoid") && pkPoints <= 3699) {
sM("You need 3700 Pk Points.");
}
if(command.startsWith("fullvesta") && pkPoints > 3700) {
pkPoints -= 3700;
addItem(9800, 1);
addItem(9801, 1);
addItem(5483, 1);
sM("@red@You have spended 37000 Pk Points on Full Vesta!");
sM("@blu@Now you have " +pkPoints+ " Pk Points!");
}
if(command.startsWith("fullvesta") && pkPoints <= 3699) {
sM("You need 3700 Pk Points.");
}
if(command.startsWith("fullstats") && pkPoints > 4000) {
pkPoints -= 4000;
addItem(9811, 1);
addItem(9812, 1);
addItem(9814, 1);
sM("@red@You have spended 4000 Pk Points on Full Statius!");
sM("@blu@Now you have " +pkPoints+ " Pk Points!");
}
if(command.startsWith("fullstats") && pkPoints <= 3999) {
sM("You need 4000 Pk Points.");
}
if(command.startsWith("fullmorg") && pkPoints > 2000) {
pkPoints -= 2000;
addItem(9808, 1);
addItem(9809, 1);
addItem(9810, 1);
sM("@red@You have spended 2000 Pk Points on Full Morrigan!");
sM("@blu@Now you have " +pkPoints+ " Pk Points!");
}
if(command.startsWith("fullmorg") && pkPoints <= 1999) {
sM("You need 2000 Pk Points.");
}
if(command.startsWith("asp") && pkPoints > 5000) {
pkPoints -= 5000;
addItem(3627, 1);
sM("@red@You have spended 5000 Pk Points on a Arcane spirit shield!");
sM("@blu@Now you have " +pkPoints+ " Pk Points!");
}
if(command.startsWith("asp") && pkPoints <= 4999) {
sM("You need 5000 Pk Points.");
}
if(command.startsWith("psp") && pkPoints > 5000) {
pkPoints -= 5000;
addItem(3629, 1);
sM("@red@You have spended 5000 Pk Points on a Spectral spirit shield!");
sM("@blu@Now you have " +pkPoints+ " Pk Points!");

}
if(command.startsWith("psp") && pkPoints <= 4999) {
sM("You need 5000 Pk Points.");
}
if(command.startsWith("dsp") && pkPoints > 5000) {
pkPoints -= 5000;
addItem(3631, 1);
sM("@red@You have spended 5000 Pk Points for a Divine spirit shield!");
sM("@blu@Now you have " +pkPoints+ " Pk Points!");
}
if(command.startsWith("dsp") && pkPoints <= 4999) {
sM("You need 5000 Pk Points.");
}
if(command.startsWith("ss") && pkPoints > 5000) {
pkPoints -= 5000;
addItem(3633, 1);
sM("@red@You have spended 5000 Pk Points for a spirit shield!");
sM("@blu@Now you have " +pkPoints+ " Pk Points!");

}
if(command.startsWith("ss") && pkPoints <= 4999) {
sM("You need 5000 Pk Points.");
}
if(command.startsWith("esp") && pkPoints > 5000) {
pkPoints -= 5000;
addItem(3637, 1);
sM("@red@You have spended 5000 Pk Points for a Elysian spirit shield!");
sM("@blu@Now you have " +pkPoints+ " Pk Points!");

}
if(command.startsWith("esp") && pkPoints <= 4999) {
sM("You need 5000 Pk Points.");
}
if(command.startsWith("bsp") && pkPoints > 5000) {
pkPoints -= 5000;
addItem(3635, 1);
sM("@red@You have spended 5000 Pk Points for a Blessed spirit shield!");
sM("@blu@Now you have " +pkPoints+ " Pk Points!");

}
if(command.startsWith("bsp") && pkPoints <= 4999) {
sM("You need 5000 Pk Points.");

if(command.startsWith("fulldagon") && pkPoints > 2500) {
pkPoints -= 2500;
addItem(14517, 1);

addItem(14519, 1);
sM("@red@You have spended 2500 Pk Points on Full Dagon Hai!");

}
if(command.startsWith("fulldagon") && pkPoints <= 2499) {
